Title: Resolutely destroy all enemies who dare to encroach upon us!
Designer: Political Department of the Zhejiang Provincial Military Command of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军浙江省军区政治部)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmin meishu chubanshe (浙江人民美术出版社)
Notes: The Mao quotation top right: 召之即来、来之能战、战之能胜 - Be ready to assemble at the first call and be capable of fighting and winning.
